home.title: Full Stack Developer
home.subtitle: Hi, I’m {{name}}. I develop scalable, user-centered solutions using web, mobile, and backend technologies, and aim to produce high-quality software through effective collaboration.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Full-stack developer with hands-on experience in technologies like React, React Native, Node.js, NestJS, Laravel, and MySQL. I’ve led and contributed to two TÜBİTAK-funded projects, strengthening my leadership and problem-solving skills. Passionate about building innovative, user-centered solutions and delivering high-quality software through effective team collaboration.

cakey.title: Full Stack Developer – Cakey
cakey.text: Worked as a full-stack developer in the Cakey project. Developed both frontend and backend features using React.js, Node.js, and Firebase; contributed to the project through debugging and code reviews.

internship.title: Intern
internship.text: Completed an internship as part of the National Internship Program, where I was responsible for data entry and reporting using Excel.

project1.title: MasAI – AI-Powered Storytelling App
project1.description: AI-powered mobile app that helps children create personalized stories and illustrations. Built using React Native, MongoDB, NestJS, Cloudinary, and Expo. I planned the entire storytelling flow and content structure. I developed the entire backend and successfully integrated it with the frontend. Integrated OpenAI-powered image generation feature into the app.

project2.title: EcoOil – Waste Oil Recycling App
project2.description: Mobile application for waste oil pickup featuring map heatmap integration, appointment scheduling, address registration, and full user management. Developed using React Native, Laravel, SQLite, Expo, and Google Maps API. I handled all development stages including full CRUD operations and led the project as the official TÜBİTAK-funded manager.

project3.title: Beauty Center Management System
project3.description: A multi-tenant web application designed for beauty centers to manage appointments, inventory, and services. Includes a responsive admin dashboard and RESTful APIs built with MySQL and Bootstrap.

project4.title: Real-Time Messaging App
project4.description: Live chat web app with real-time messaging, user authentication, and responsive design. Built the frontend, backend, and message sync logic using ReactJS and Firebase.
